thread.title: Fox shares snap of mini-me son
thread.title_full: Fox shares snap of mini-me son

title: Fox shares snap of mini-me son
text:
Fox shares snap of mini-me son 9:16 AM Network Vision COULD he be any cuter? Megan Fox has shared a rare photo her “stunner” son Bodhi on Instagram in the wake of her split from Brian Austin Green. Odom ‘spent $75k on prostitutes’ 9:12 AM Network Writers FORMER NBA star Lamar Odom reportedly paid $75,000 for two sex workers during the three-day drugs binge that has left him fighting for his life. Lamar ‘squeezes Kim Kardashian’s hand’ 7:31 AM Network Writers INSIDERS say Lamar Odom is showing signs of improvement. He’s reportedly fluttered his eyelids, and even squeezed Kim Kardashian’s hand. Did Karl find the real Latham? 6:42 AM Shoba Rao MARK Latham has mysteriously responded to claims he was behind a Twitter account which posted offensive tweets about prominent Australian women. Megan Fox shares rare snap of blue-eyed son Bodhi in wake of divorce from Brian Austin Green October 16, 2015 8:16am Just like mum ... Megan Fox has shared an adorable snap of son Bodhi. Picture: Getty Network Vision News Corp Australia Network Share Email a friend 
MEGAN Fox isn’t as obsessed as with social media as some stars but her latest snap warrants bragging rights. 
The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles actress shared a rare Instagram photo of her youngest son Bodhi and he couldn’t be any cuter. 
“Bodhi: Stunner. Clown. Unicorn,” said the proud mum. 
Too cool for school in a vintage Nirvana T-shirt, the adorable one-year-old proved quite the stunner with the same trademark blue eyes and long lashes as his mother. Big blue eyes 
The discreet actress has only shared a handful of photos of her children, introducing Bodhi to the world via The Ellen Show last year. 
“Bodhi is the little chubby one and then Noah is the one with the lips,” she explained. Tender moment 
The new snap comes in wake of the star’s divorce from Brian Austin Green, with sources saying the couple separated after constantly arguing about Fox’s rising movie career. 
Despite their reported conflict, the actors are making an effort to remain on good terms. 
“They’re on friendly terms for the sake of their kids,” added the source. “They just want to do their own things.” Splitsville ... Megan Fox and Brian Austin Green in October 2014. Picture: Getty Source: Supplied 
Following news of the split, Fox broke her 23-week silence on Instagram to check in with her fans. “Hi. I’m still here,” she captioned a selfie. “I just continue to have an angsty relationship with social media. But what better way to express my apprehension than with a selfie. This time in black and white!” Megan Fox
